entry.title: musikkcontroller
entry.content:
musikkcontroller is an mac os app that creates a bridge between your phone and your computer to send OSC data and create simple-to-use mobile music interfaces for MaxMSP, SuperCollider etc.

Architecutre

When you open the app con your mac it promps for a PORT to rout OSC message in your localhost.

It deploys a simple EXPRESS-based server to deploy the interface to your phone. Using Websockets the page oxsn your phone communicates with a websocket bridge in musikkontroller that routes the websocket info to OSC in roder to be usable in any OSC capable app.

A QRCODE is also used for making more simple openning the webapp on your phone. Simply scan the QRCODE and it will connect automatically.

Code

The code is available on Github
entry.summary: musikkcontroller is an mac os app that creates a bridge between your phone and your computer to send OSC data and create simple-to-use mobile music interfaces for MaxMSP, SuperCollider etc.

entry.title: SARII
entry.content:
SARII (Simple ARtificial Intelligence Inspiration) is an artificial neural network that likes to write inspiration quotes.

Follow @SARII_bot

Data

SARII has been trainned on quotes from a wide range of real authors available on GoodReads

Architecure

SARII is based in a easy to train AWD-LSTM neural network architecure [Paper] which is Long short-term memory (LSTM) Recurrent Neural Netwrok (RNN).

Twitter Bot

The main goal of SARII was to compete with another accounts that like to share quotes embedded on images. So the process is not only generating a quote but automating the process of searching a image from Unsplash editing the image, putting the quote on it and sharing it on social media.

The final result looks like this

Tweets by SARII_bot

Code

The code is available on Github
entry.summary: SARII (Simple ARtificial Intelligence Inspiration) is an artificial neural network that likes to write inspiration quotes.
